job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent field

jd:
Job Description - Full Stack Java Developer (Backend Focus) – Hybrid
Location – Chicago, IL (Relocation Accepted)
6+ Months (Contract to Hire)
Interview Process: Video
Experience: 8+ years
Industry Background: Aviation or similar 24/7 operations preferred
Need:
Need DL/Visa Copies with Passport copy
Full Education with Year
LinkedIn profile with Photo is Mandatory (LinkedIn must be made before or in 2021)
Must-Have Skills:
Java
Spring Framework
Angular
Responsibilities:
Develop web applications that are engaging and user-friendly, focusing on responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
Collaborate with design and implementation teams to create web solutions, including portals and mobile functionalities.
Work within an Agile/Scrum framework, ensuring high-quality outcomes in a dynamic environment.
Provide guidance on industry best practices for web development, focusing on SEO and page optimization.
Collaborate with Quality Assurance to ensure the final product meets quality standards.
Conduct benefit analyses for IT solutions and recommend technology directions.
Stay updated on industry trends and new technologies, and supervise/direct assigned staff.
Participate in recruiting and performance reviews as needed.
Qualifications/Education:
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent field.
Technical Requirements:
Programming Languages: Java 17, J2EE, Spring Boot 3+, jQuery, JavaScript, Node.js 9.5, Angular 17+
ORM Framework: Hibernate
Application Servers: WebSphere, WebLogic
Messaging Platforms: MQ, EMS
AWS experience: A plus
Additional Expertise:
Responsive web design and fluid layouts
Cross-browser behavior and compatibility
SEO concepts and implementation
Source control systems (Git, SVN, TFS)
Rapid prototyping skills
Unit testing using established frameworks
